field.name: fTakedownAboveMaxDiffHorizontalDistance
field.desc: Max diff horizontal distance from 1st TDA target to 2nd target to allow a double

field.name: fTakedownAboveMaxDiffVerticalDistance
field.desc: Max diff vertical distance from 1st TDA target to 2nd target to allow a double

field.name: fTakedownAboveMinHeightAboveEnemyHead
field.desc: If your feet are any closer to the enemies head then it will not be allow the takedown to trigger

field.name: fTakedownAboveMaxHorizDistance
field.desc: Enemies further than this will not be considered

field.name: fTakedownAboveMaxDistToEnemy
field.desc: This is the final straight line distance check (feet to head) to determine validity of the target

field.name: fTakedownAboveOuterDistance
field.desc: This is the distance passed for the first test that finds all visible entities. Must be about 2 meters larger than the other distances

field.name: fTakedownAboveDetectionFOV
field.desc: Fov from the player?s view for detecting enemies

field.name: fTakedownAboveMinDownSpeed
field.desc: You must be travelling at this many m/s downwards (only considers the vertical speed)

field.name: fTakedownAbovePromptMaxHorizDistance
field.desc: Max horiz distance to target for prompt to appear.

field.name: fTakedownAbovePromptMinHeightAboveHead
field.desc: Min height above NPC's head for prompt validity. Can be -ive.

field.name: fTakedownAbovePromptMaxHeightAboveHead
field.desc: Max height above NPC's head for prompt validity.

field.name: fTakedownAbovePromptFOV
field.desc: FOV for considering valid targets for the prompt.
